title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 391: Featuring Larry Murphy
description:
On Episode 391 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Larry Murphy. Larry joined (56:37) to talk about his Hall of Fame career, some funny stories, and his new 3Ice venture. But first, the guys open the show and recap the Battle of Alberta, Colorado-St. Louis, and Rangers-Hurricanes. The guys then jump back on after Hurricanes-Rangers Game 7 to wrap up that series and give their conference finals predictions for Colorado-Edmonton and New York-Tampa (02:26:07)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
